first.feedback: I found a relaxed atmosphere, and the medina is exactly the right size to get your bearings and explore without getting (too) lost. a lovely experience and a lot of hidden little shops to discover, I'll visit it again and again
first.name: Mr. Smith

second.feedback: Very safe and friendly Medina. Every shop and stall imaginable. The people donâ€™t hassle you. Good prices, lots of great places to eat and drink
second.name: Ms. Fatima

third.feedback: I am in love with this city. No matter how many times I come back, I just keep discovering more and more. I recommend staying at a Riad versus a hotel for a more authentic experience.
third.author: Mme. Morgane
